pr_title: Allow id to be passed to console prod/cons; fixes #160

timeline.body:
IDK about naming on this. 

How about
```suggestion
  private ParsedSchema getSchemaId(SchemaRegistryClient schemaRegistry,
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
IDK about naming on this.

How about

Suggested change
private ParsedSchema getSchemaById(SchemaRegistryClient schemaRegistry,
private ParsedSchema getSchemaId(SchemaRegistryClient schemaRegistry,
timeline.author: OneCricketeer

replies.bodyText: Thanks @cricket007 , it's short for "get ParsedSchema by its ID", rather than "get the ParsedSchema's ID"
replies.author: rayokota
